footer.description: Innovation. Inspiration. Emotion. We are 330,000+ hospitality Talents perfecting the art of welcome with passion, inspiring and designing new ways of connecting and experiencing the world. People are the heart of everything we do â€“ fostering authentic and meaningful connections, and constantly seeking to spark delight for our clients and to deliver excellence. Our bold and visionary approach reaches far beyond the traditional hotel model, reimagining and continuously transforming hospitality to craft and unlock exceptional experiences for our clients, to give back to the planet and our communities, and drive value for our partners and all stakeholders.
